0.question:
Consider a bag filled with 10 marbles, 6 of which are blue and 4 of which are yellow. The marbles will be drawn from the bag 15 times and the sequence of blues (B) and yellows (Y) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $50 if the sequence you chose appears on successive draws of the marbles.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) EEKEK
(b) EKEE
(c) KEEEK.

1.question:
Consider a bag containing 5 blue marbles and 3 yellow marbles. The bag will be randomly picked from 15 times and the sequence of blues (B) and yellows (Y) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win a gift card worth $50 if the sequence you chose appears on successive picks of the marbles.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) VVNVNNV
(b) NNVNVVNV
(c) VVVVNV.

2.question:
Consider a spinner with three purple sections and two yellow sections. The spinner will be spun 15 times and the sequence of purples (P) and yellows (Y) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win a prize of $30 if the sequence you chose appears on successive spins of the spinner.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) JHHJJJJ
(b) HHHJHH
(c) JJJHHHJ.

3.question:
Consider a bag of ten marbles, with six blue marbles (B) and four yellow marbles (Y). The bag will be shaken 15 times and the sequence of blues (B) and yellows (Y) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win a $50 gift card if the sequence you chose appears on successive shakes of the bag.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) WVWVVV
(b) WVVWW
(c) VWVVWV.

4.question:
Consider a bag containing 8 blue balls and 4 yellow balls. The balls will be drawn from the bag 10 times and the sequence of blue (B) and yellow (Y) balls will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win a $50 gift card if the sequence you chose appears on successive draws from the bag.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) ETEE
(b) TTTTTTET
(c) ETTTE.
